metadata.name: 2013 Bowman Chrome Aaron Judge - PSA 10 (Cert: 42120057)
metadata.description: The owner of this BPX Vault Token is granted exclusive ownership rights to the asset as shown on this token and uniquely identified by the PSA Certification #42120057 The current owner may request to have the physical card sent to them, free of charge, in exchange for transferring this NFT Vault Token to Blokpax (the current physical custodian of this card). Rights of ownership of the card secured by this NFT are transferred with the possession of this NFT. For redemption instructions please visit: blokpax.com/contact
